messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

issues with july issues dear extremely hard work slow performance expectations wait seconds action after button second yesterday logged today find even budgetary control etc also extract did excel format members how please assist thank senior ext

The ticket mentions "slow performance" and "wait seconds," which strongly suggests a performance-related issue.

I'm leaning towards a broader categorization given the mixed signals.
